p: The physical and chemical properties of soil under- and outside canopy of N. glauca of the three studied locations (SHFA, WHT, and RDF) are shown in Table 3. Moreover, the detailed soil analysis of all stands was presented in Table S1. The N, P, Cl, EC, Ca, Mg, N, K, and clay contents showed significant differences among the studied locations. However, pH, SO4, silt, sand, and moisture content did not show a significant difference ( Table 3).
